body_content.explanation: a round, sweet bread containing dried fruit and sometimes lemon curd (= a thick, sweet substance made from lemons, sugar, eggs, and butter), with icing (= a white substance made from sugar and water) and a glacé cherry (= a red fruit preserved in sugar) on top:
examples: I was in a cake shop buying a Belgian bun.
After the twins were born I had months of sleepless nights, and to cheer myself up I binged on Belgian buns.
